text: Mariyu allah mi vanti vari nundiye mi sahavasulanu (ajvaj lanu) puttincadu. Mariyu mi sahavasula nundi miku pillalanu mariyu manamallanu prasadinci, miku uttamamaina jivanopadhulanu kuda samakurcadu. Ayina varu (manavulu) asatyamaina vatini (daivaluga) visvasinci, allah anugrahalanu tiraskaristara
